00029 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00030 #include "config.h"
00031 #endif
00032 
00033 #include <glib.h>
00034 #include <math.h>
00035 
00036 #include <glib/gstdio.h>
00037 #include "gerbv.h"
00038 
00039 /* DEBUG printing.  #define DEBUG 1 in config.h to use this fcn. */
00040 #define dprintf if(DEBUG) printf
00041 #define round(x) floor(x+0.5)
00042 
00043 gboolean
00044 gerbv_export_drill_file_from_image (gchar *filename, gerbv_image_t *image) {
00045        FILE *fd;
00046        GArray *apertureTable = g_array_new(FALSE,FALSE,sizeof(int));
00047        gerbv_net_t *currentNet;
00048        
00049        if ((fd = g_fopen(filename, "w")) == NULL) {
00050               GERB_MESSAGE("Can't open file for writing: %s\n", filename);
00051               return FALSE;
00052        }
00053        /* write header info */
00054        fprintf(fd, "M48\n");
00055        fprintf(fd, "INCH,TZ\n");
00056 
00057        /* define all apertures */
00058        gerbv_aperture_t *currentAperture;
00059        gint i;
00060               
00061        for (i=APERTURE_MIN; i<APERTURE_MAX; i++) {
00062               currentAperture = image->aperture[i];
00063               
00064               if (!currentAperture)
00065                      continue;
00066               
00067               switch (currentAperture->type) {
00068                      case GERBV_APTYPE_CIRCLE:
00069                             fprintf(fd, "T%dC%1.3f\n",i,currentAperture->parameter[0]);
00070                             /* add the "approved" aperture to our valid list */
00071                             g_array_append_val (apertureTable, i);
00072                             break;  
00073                      default:
00074                             break;
00075               }
00076        }
00077        
00078        fprintf(fd, "%%\n");
00079        /* write rest of image */
00080        
00081        for (i=0; i<apertureTable->len; i++) {
00082               int currentAperture=g_array_index (apertureTable, int, i);
00083               
00084               /* write tool change */
00085               fprintf(fd, "T%d\n",currentAperture);
00086               
00087               /* run through all nets and look for drills using this aperture */
00088               for (currentNet = image->netlist; currentNet; currentNet = currentNet->next){
00089                      if ((currentNet->aperture == currentAperture)&&(currentNet->aperture_state == GERBV_APERTURE_STATE_FLASH)) {
00090                             long xVal,yVal;
00091                             xVal = (long) round(currentNet->stop_x * 10000.0);
00092                             yVal = (long) round(currentNet->stop_y * 10000.0);
00093                             fprintf(fd, "X%06ldY%06ld\n",xVal,yVal);
00094                      }
00095               }
00096        }
00097        g_array_free (apertureTable, TRUE);
00098        /* write footer */
00099        fprintf(fd, "M30\n\n");
00100 
00101        fclose(fd);
00102        return TRUE;
00103 }
